verses.verse: Moses<WH4872> went<WH3212> and spoke<WH1696> these words<WH1697> to all Israel.<WH3478>

He said<WH559> to them,<WH3967> "I am one hundred twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> this day;<WH3117> I can<WH3201> no more go out<WH3318> and come in:<WH935> and Yahweh<WH3068> has said<WH559> to me,<WH5674> 'You shall not go over this Jordan.<WH3383>'

Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> he will go over<WH5674> before<WH6440> you;<WH8045> he will destroy these nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> you,<WH3423> and you shall dispossess them.<WH3091> Joshua shall go over<WH5674> before<WH6440> you,<WH3068> as Yahweh has spoken.<WH1696>
Yahweh<WH3068> will do<WH6213> to them as he did<WH6213> to Sihon<WH5511> and to Og,<WH5747> the kings<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> and to their land;<WH776> whom he destroyed.<WH8045>
Yahweh<WH3068> will deliver them up<WH5414> before you,<WH6440> and you shall do<WH6213> to them according to all the commandment<WH4687> which I have commanded you.<WH6680>

Be strong<WH2388> and courageous,<WH553> don't<WH3372> be afraid, nor be scared<WH6206> of them:<WH6440> for Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> he it is who does go<WH1980> with you;<WH7503> he will not fail you,<WH5800> nor forsake you."

Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> to Joshua,<WH3091> and said<WH559> to him in the sight<WH5869> of all Israel,<WH3478> "Be strong<WH2388> and courageous:<WH553> for you shall go<WH935> with this people<WH5971> into the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> has sworn<WH7650> to their fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> them;<WH5157> and you shall cause them to inherit it.
Yahweh,<WH3068> he it is who does go<WH1980> before<WH6440> you;<WH7503> he will be with you, he will not fail you,<WH5800> neither forsake you:<WH3372> don't be afraid, neither be dismayed.<WH2865>"

Moses<WH4872> wrote<WH3789> this law,<WH8451> and delivered<WH5414> it to the priests<WH3548> the sons<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> who bore<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and to all the elders<WH2205> of Israel.<WH3478>

Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> them,<WH559> saying, "At the end<WH7093> of every seven<WH7651> years,<WH8141> in the set<WH4150> time of the year<WH8141> of release,<WH8059> in the feast<WH2282> of tents,<WH5521>

when all Israel<WH3478> has come<WH935> to appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which he shall choose,<WH977> you shall read<WH7121> this law<WH8451> before all Israel<WH3478> in their hearing.<WH241>

Assemble<WH6950> the<WH6950> people,<WH5971> the men<WH582> and the women<WH802> and the little ones,<WH2945> and your foreigner<WH1616> who is within your gates,<WH8179> that they may hear,<WH8085> and that they may learn,<WH3925> and fear<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> all the words<WH1697> of this law;<WH8451>

and that their children,<WH1121> who have not known,<WH3045> may hear,<WH8085> and learn<WH3925> to fear<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> as long as<WH3117> you live<WH2416> in the land<WH127> where you go over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383> to possess it.<WH3423>"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Behold,<WH3117> your days approach<WH7126> that you must die:<WH4191> call<WH7121> Joshua,<WH3091> and present<WH3320> yourselves in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> that I may commission<WH6680> him.<WH4872>" Moses and Joshua<WH3091> went,<WH3212> and presented<WH3320> themselves in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> in the Tent<WH168> in a pillar<WH5982> of cloud:<WH6051> and the pillar<WH5982> of cloud<WH6051> stood<WH5975> over the door<WH6607> of the Tent.<WH168>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Behold,<WH7901> you shall sleep with your fathers;<WH1> and this people<WH5971> will rise up,<WH6965> and play the prostitute<WH2181> after<WH310> the strange<WH5236> gods<WH430> of the land,<WH776> where they go<WH935> to be among<WH7130> them,<WH5800> and will forsake me,<WH6565> and break my covenant<WH1285> which I have made with them.<WH3772>

Then my anger<WH639> shall be kindled<WH2734> against them in that day,<WH3117> and I will forsake<WH5800> them,<WH5641> and I will hide my face<WH6440> from them,<WH398> and they shall be devoured, and many<WH7227> evils<WH7451> and troubles<WH6869> shall come on<WH4672> them;<WH559> so that they will say in that day,<WH3117> <WH7451> 'Haven't these evils come<WH4672> on us because our God<WH430> is not among us?<WH7130>'

I will surely<WH5641> hide<WH5641> my face<WH6440> in that day<WH3117> for all the evil<WH7451> which they shall have worked,<WH6213> in that<WH3588> they are turned<WH6437> to other<WH312> gods.<WH430>

"Now therefore write<WH3789> this song<WH7892> for yourselves,<WH3925> and teach it to the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> put<WH7760> it in their mouths,<WH6310> that this song<WH7892> may be a witness<WH5707> for me against the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

For when I shall have brought<WH935> them into the land<WH127> which I swore<WH7650> to their fathers,<WH1> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> and they shall have eaten<WH398> and filled<WH7646> themselves,<WH1878> and grown fat; then will they turn<WH6437> to other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and serve<WH5647> them,<WH5006> and despise me,<WH6565> and break my covenant.<WH1285>

It shall happen,<WH7227> when many evils<WH7451> and troubles<WH6869> have come on<WH4672> them,<WH7892> that this song shall testify<WH6030> before<WH6440> them as a witness;<WH5707> for it shall not be forgotten<WH7911> out of the mouths<WH6310> of their seed:<WH2233> for I know<WH3045> their imagination<WH3336> which they frame<WH6213> this day,<WH3117> before I have brought<WH935> them into the land<WH776> which I swore.<WH7650>"
So Moses<WH4872> wrote<WH3789> this song<WH7892> the same day,<WH3117> and taught<WH3925> it the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

He commissioned<WH6680> Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and said,<WH559> "Be strong<WH2388> and courageous;<WH553> for you shall bring<WH935> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> into the land<WH776> which I swore to them:<WH7650> and I will be with you."
It happened,<WH4872> when Moses had made an end<WH3615> of writing<WH3789> the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451> in a book,<WH5612> until they were finished,<WH8552>
that Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> the Levites,<WH3881> who bore<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh,<WH3068> saying,<WH559>

"Take<WH3947> this book<WH5612> of the law,<WH8451> and put<WH7760> it by the side<WH6654> of the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> that it may be there for a witness against you.<WH5707>

For I know<WH3045> your rebellion,<WH4805> and your stiff<WH7186> neck:<WH6203> behold,<WH2416> while I am yet alive with you this day,<WH3117> you have been rebellious<WH4784> against Yahweh;<WH3068> and how much more after<WH310> my death?<WH4194>

Assemble<WH6950> to me all the elders<WH2205> of your tribes,<WH7626> and your officers,<WH7860> that I may speak<WH1696> these words<WH1697> in their ears,<WH241> and call<WH5749> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776> to witness against them.<WH5749>

For I know<WH3045> that after<WH310> my death<WH4194> you will utterly<WH7843> corrupt<WH7843> yourselves,<WH5493> and turn aside from the way<WH1870> which I have commanded<WH6680> you;<WH7451> and evil will happen<WH7122> to you in the latter<WH319> days;<WH3117> because you will do<WH6213> that which is evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to provoke him to anger<WH3707> through the work<WH4639> of your hands.<WH3027>"
Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> in the ears<WH241> of all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel<WH3478> the words<WH1697> of this song,<WH7892> until they were finished.<WH8552>
